mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_role (ROLE_NAME, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME) values (#{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME from t_role
